scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Adam and Eve standing within a large, oval-shaped vessel, possibly representing the womb or a symbolic enclosure. They are nude, with Adam on the left and Eve on the right. Behind them, a lush landscape unfolds with trees and bushes. In the background, a fortified structure, possibly a castle or a walled city, is visible on a hill. The overall impression is of a primordial or allegorical setting.
